scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin utah.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/utah.html && usemin arizona.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/arizona.html && usemin washington.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/washington.html && usemin squamish.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/squamish.html && usemin whistler.html -d dist -htmlmin -o dist/whistler.html && usemin oregon.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/oregon.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
